meanings.def: having a particular color or different colors
examples: The street was ablaze with colored lights.
She was wearing a cream-colored suit.
The words are written in a different-colored ink.
He uses ink and colored pencils in his drawings.

meanings.def: from a race that does not have white skin
(in South Africa) having parents who are of different races

related: National Association for the Advancement of Colored People

meanings.def: a person who does not have white skin
(in South Africa) a person whose parents are of different races
